Introduction
This topic contains information about correcting a CUE that requires the severance of SC, including jurisdiction of the
rating activity over the severance of SC
, and
authorization activity over the severance of SC
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section C - Due Process and Authorization Issues for Clear and Unmistakable Error (CUE)
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 5, Section C
